summary: The diff modifies 5 key frontend components (ImageGenerator, PhotoGallery, VideoGallery, VideoGenerator, SearchPage) plus supporting files. All five REQs are substantially addressed: multi-platform fallback image sources, YouTube-free MP4 video sources, inline <video> elements, and fallback chains. However, some acceptance criteria have gaps, particularly around using truly distinct platforms (Unsplash vs Picsum) for REQ-27 and REQ-31, and around chat message rendering for REQ-29 and REQ-30.

missing_requirements.requirement: Image sources are drawn from at least two different public platforms (e.g., Unsplash and Picsum/Pexels)
missing_requirements.reason: The ImageGenerator buildImageUrls function uses only Picsum Photos for all three fallback URLs (seed variant 1, seed variant 2, and random). No second platform such as Unsplash or Pexels is used.

missing_requirements.requirement: Photos shared in chat messages also render without broken icons
missing_requirements.reason: The diff only modifies PhotoGallery.tsx for grid/lightbox views. There is no evidence in the diff that chat message photo rendering was updated to use the same fallback approach.

missing_requirements.requirement: Videos shared in chat messages render and play inline without broken icons
missing_requirements.reason: The diff only modifies VideoGallery.tsx for the grid view. There is no evidence in the diff that chat message video rendering was updated to use inline <video> elements with fallback MP4 sources.

missing_requirements.requirement: Photo search uses at least two image source platforms with fallback behavior
missing_requirements.reason: The SearchPage buildPhotoResults function uses only Picsum Photos for both the primary and fallback URLs (two different seeds, same platform). The requirement specifies using at least two different platforms such as Unsplash and Picsum.
